TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CalloutAnnotation extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation

span.span: Represents a callout annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标注批注是批注位置和定位点之间绘制一个连接的唯一注释。A callout annotation is the only annotation that draws a connection between the annotation position and the anchor point. 此类可以还显示文本，并自动计算其所需的大小。This class can also display text and automatically calculate its required size. 支持不同的标注样式。Different callout styles are supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public CalloutAnnotation ();

public: CalloutAnnotation();

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为行与定位点连接的批注定位点端的样式。The property sets the style of the anchor cap for the line that connects the annotation with the anchor point. 此属性才适用或使用标注样式。This property is only applicable when a or callout style is used.
